name: Koto The Pixel DX
description:
Koto The Pixel DX

Controls- 

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move, 
  • Z, J, or SPACE to jump, 
  • R to retry

Koto the Pixel was one of my earlier game jam games made for a LOWREZJAM a few years back, a game about growing and shrinking. Despite its simplicity the original seemed to be more popular than most of my other game jam games, yet I always felt it could be improved. So for LOWREZJAM 2020 I decided to remake it (from the ground up!) and see just how much better I could make it. Enjoy!
